verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We're feeding on the living Bread
We're drinking at the fountain head;
And who-so drinketh, Jesus said
Shall never, never thirst again.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
What! Never thirst again?
No, never thirst again!
What! never thirst again?
No, never thirst again!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
And who-so drinketh, Jesus said,
Shall never, never thirst again!
